name: vsavm
description: Vector Symbolic Architecture Virtual Machine - Axiologic Research experiment

scripts.trainTinyLLM: node eval_tinyLLM/tools/train-vsavm.mjs && node eval_tinyLLM/tools/train-tf.mjs && node eval_tinyLLM/tools/eval-vsavm.mjs && node eval_tinyLLM/tools/eval-tf.mjs
scripts.trainTinyLLM:quick: node eval_tinyLLM/tools/train-vsavm.mjs && node eval_tinyLLM/tools/train-tf.mjs --quick && node eval_tinyLLM/tools/eval-vsavm.mjs && node eval_tinyLLM/tools/eval-tf.mjs
scripts.trainTinyLLM:force: node eval_tinyLLM/tools/train-vsavm.mjs --force && node eval_tinyLLM/tools/train-tf.mjs --force && node eval_tinyLLM/tools/eval-vsavm.mjs && node eval_tinyLLM/tools/eval-tf.mjs
